member.name: M:Examine.SearchCriteria.ISearchCriteria.RawQuery(System.String)
member.summary: Passes a text string which is preformatted for the underlying search API. Examine will not modify this
member.remarks: This allows a developer to completely bypass and Examine logic and comprise their own query text which they are passing in. It means that if the search is too complex to achieve with the fluent API, or too dynamic to achieve with a static language the provider can still handle it.
